attributes.action: not charge Teachers Council Tax due to their work in the public sector
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: In the same par as Nurses and Doctors not being charged for Council Tax. Teachers work for the most part in the public sector, and the amount of work/dedication/time required of them should mean they are exempt from paying Council Tax, or to at least receive a massive reduction in cost.
